title: GitHub Activity Dashboard
description: Real-time GitHub statistics and activity metrics using the GitHub API. This dashboard demonstrates API integration, data visualization, and AWS Console-style UI patterns.
usernameDescription: Enter any GitHub username to view their statistics

validation.usernameTooLong: Username must be 39 characters or less
validation.usernameInvalidFormat: Username may only contain alphanumeric characters or hyphens, and cannot begin or end with a hyphen
